website_summaries.verdict: You won't find a better microneedle derma roller in this price range.
pros: Needles do their job without excessive pain
cons: Some have said their needles dulled after a few weeks of regular use

customer_reviews.title: A must try!
customer_reviews.text: Soooo glad I decide to try this item! I had a sun mark on my face that kept getting bigger and darker. I went to a dermatologist and they said in was not cancerous, but I didn’t know how to get rid of it. I heard about the deems rollers and decided to give it a try. I took a before and after picture where you can see the brown spot is completely gone. I used this item for about 6 months to get that result. I had that spot on my face for at least 10 yrs. I am just so shocked that I was able to clear it up.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: easy to use and show efficiency
customer_reviews.text: I recommend you to really do some good research about derma roller, it’s extremely important to know how to taking care of your skin befor and after the treatment. I especially love this product because it’s easy to use and show efficiency, you will have to be patience because the results won’t come after a few months. please clean your derma roll with alcohol and avoid applying makeup after the treatment
customer_reviews.author: Ngan Vi

customer_reviews.title: ... done this twice now and I could not be happier. I woke up this morning after using it ...
customer_reviews.text: I have done this twice now and I could not be happier. I woke up this morning after using it last night and my face had literally pushed out all of my blackheads and rejected everything bad in my nose, chine, cheek areas. It was amazing!!! I scrubbed my face this morning and was shocked at how amazing this product is after just two uses.
customer_reviews.author: Miranda

customer_reviews.title: This derma roller is amazing! It really works and you will see results
customer_reviews.text: This derma roller is amazing! It really works and you will see results . this roller has helped to decrease my scaring left by acne on my face. Im talking holes and blemishes . They have decreased dramatically . I will say this roller deff to increase product absorption and minor pitted scarring removal. to stimulate collagen I would suggest lower needles. It does smooth out and tighten your skin, decreasing the size of enlarged pores.
customer_reviews.author: CJ

customer_reviews.title: It works!
customer_reviews.text: I don’t have anything else to compare it to. I use it on my face and lips and then use serum. My face is looking great!
customer_reviews.author: YMS

customer_reviews.title: I like this little gizmo a lot
customer_reviews.text: I like this little gizmo a lot. Don't use it all the time but don't seem to have to. Skin has a healthy glow after using. Doesn't hurt a bit and I have sensitive skin.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Totally satisfied!!
customer_reviews.text: Very very pleased!! I went on line to research this product since I've never used one before. All I can say is WOW!! I've used this for three days now and I can deff see an improvement. Started with the lowest mm but have since bought the.50mm. Btw was going to get treatments at a spa for $799 for only 4 treatments. Do you realize how much I've saved???
customer_reviews.author: Angie

customer_reviews.title: Smooth youthful skin
customer_reviews.text: This definitely works. In the words of my husband..."Holy crap you look young!" Has no idea that I've started using this.
customer_reviews.author: Nette

customer_reviews.title: Buyer beware!
customer_reviews.text: FAKE PRODUCT! Buyer beware! You get what you pay for. The needles were dull and did nothing but drag across my skin and leave lines and marks. When I opened the box, I noticed the instructions had grammar and spelling errors, which was a red flag form the start. Go ahead and do yourself a favor and buy a high quality derma roller like Banish. (no, I'm not sponsored by them, just giving an honest review) Do not listen to these other positive reviews because they obviously are either fake or have never used a high quality roller before!
customer_reviews.author: Megan Garza

customer_reviews.title: I love this roller
customer_reviews.text: I love this roller. I rediscovered it recently after I stopped using it during a breakout cycle. It really does allow for better absorption of skin care products, allowing you to use less and for your products to go farther and last longer. This is my first roller and I'm not sure if I will purchase a unit with longer needles in the future. I'm not sure how much this would benefit my skin, but regardless, this is great for a beginner and/or someone who might be sensitive to the sensation on your face.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Ok for the price
customer_reviews.text: It’s my first dermaroller to purchase and use. It was recommended to me. It’s an ok item, fair item for the price paid but I doubt I’ll order another from them. The instructions have misspellings and incorrect words. That always bothers me.
customer_reviews.author: RG

customer_reviews.title: Nice product
customer_reviews.text: If I understand how it works it will be months before I really see how well it works but I wanted to leave a comment about the product itself. It is very well built, not at all painful, has a nice transparent carry case and very good value. As a funny side note, I think this might make a very useful tool for pricking sausage when I make them. You prick the casings to let steam out while cooking. I'll have to get another for that if it does the job. :)
customer_reviews.author: Walter Jeffries

customer_reviews.title: I don’t feel it is safe.
customer_reviews.text: Product doesn’t state where it was manufactured , what materials it is made from. Grammar on package is poor and package smells like mold or mildew. I am not comfortable using it. Now I find out I can’t return it.
customer_reviews.author: Jane

customer_reviews.title: this is good only for use before applying moisturizer or acid
customer_reviews.text: this is good only for use before applying moisturizer or acid. Pokes holes in your face. It does not go deep enough to affect collagen. To be clear.
customer_reviews.author: Getagrip

customer_reviews.title: Really Like This!
customer_reviews.text: I had to use it for a while before I could see a difference but it is helping to build more collagen around my eyes.
customer_reviews.author: michael hulme

customer_reviews.title: Nice roller
customer_reviews.text: This is a nice little needle roller. I’ve had it a few weeks and use it daily. I think it helps the vitamin C serum get deeper.
customer_reviews.author: Book junkie

customer_reviews.title: interesting
customer_reviews.text: im surprised this rolling thing actually DOES make skin and scars better and isnt painful in any way...you barely even feel it doing anything but then after using can see improvements after first use...i cleanse face, then roll...light cleanse again and then do whatever mask i feel i need that week...
customer_reviews.author: jax

customer_reviews.title: Cool little product!
customer_reviews.text: I really enjoy using this it’s very relaxing. I feel very good after using like I’m doing well for my skin. I do believe it helps open up your face so cleansing products can penetrate your skin easier but I’m not sure how well it works for minimizing wrinkles.
customer_reviews.author: Kiley

customer_reviews.title: Soft and Comfortable
customer_reviews.text: Works well, it isn't painful at all. I use it with my retinol, hydraulic acid, and vitamin c serum. It rolls softly and isn't too abrasive feeling. Remember to start off with not using it too often. Your body has to adjust and heal between uses.
customer_reviews.author: Audrie

customer_reviews.title: It works!
customer_reviews.text: Love this product! It has helped me repair some really bad hormonal acne scars. You have to use it regularly with a good serum. I used the Trader Joe’s serum before and after I used the derma needle. It does get dull after a while. I’ll replace mine for sure.
customer_reviews.author: np

customer_reviews.title: as described and works well
customer_reviews.text: make sure to do plenty of research before you derma roll. too soon to note any positive effects as this takes time and patience and consistent proper use BUT i actually like the way it feels. It doesn't hurt at all (only speaking for myself) just has a nice tingle feeling that makes your skin feel "awake"
customer_reviews.author: Live Aloha

customer_reviews.title: Like 👍
customer_reviews.text: I liked the video for the face in quality. There are instructions for processing it and a plastic case for storage. Needles are as described. I am taking a course and am very glad that I got it. The main thing: follow the processing rules and learn how to use it 👍
customer_reviews.author: Jane

customer_reviews.title: Totally Recommend
customer_reviews.text: I had a patch of skin about the size of a nickel next to my nose that looked like a fresh burn. I used this for a couple months and the spot wasn’t raised up anymore and went away
customer_reviews.author: Lindsey Cameron

customer_reviews.title: To The Micro Needling Company
customer_reviews.text: I am writing to say that the product, I ordered the face micro Needleing product, was not A Good Product for me, But, may. Be for others. The Company was Very Good at giving me my Refund ,, and quickly too!!! It just wasnt for Me, T.H. Thank you very much,,Terrie
customer_reviews.author: Terrie Hughes

customer_reviews.title: Adds some oomph to your skin products
customer_reviews.text: After doing some research on dermarolling, I hopped on the bandwagon and decided to try the 0.25. I completely expected this to hurt but the needles don't go in that deep; honestly not painful at all. I've been using this to help my skin better absorb my serums and creams before bed and it's been working wonders. I am considering getting another one a few sizes up to help with my acne scars.
customer_reviews.author: Victoria Lazo

customer_reviews.title: So disappointed
customer_reviews.text: I was really happy to get one of these finally it came in omg it was dirty pretty sure it was used it was little hairs inside of there i was so disappointed
customer_reviews.author: Troy L Johnson

customer_reviews.title: Painless
customer_reviews.text: Wow I really thought this was going to be harder and hurt. I'm shocked at how easy and painless it actually is. A simple addition to a beauty routine with great benifits.
customer_reviews.author: Sashawottt

customer_reviews.title: you should try this roller
customer_reviews.text: It's hard to find a beauty tool that suits yourself skin. It's suitable for others but not necessarily for you. I try this roller and the result surprised me. It worked great. So I think that want to find a friend who is suitable for oneself beauty tools, you can try this product.
customer_reviews.author: Rajashree Venkatraman

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: Product arrived packaged nicely but the case had pieces of plastic broken off and rolling around :/ I’ve only used this product once so far, and my skin felt nice the morning after using. Just wish the case wasn’t broken.
customer_reviews.author: Lauren

customer_reviews.title: Easy to clean and use
customer_reviews.text: I love the case it comes in-helps protect it and keep clean. So far it’s easy and fun to use. Hoping it makes headway on some baby stretch marks! Will update on that later
customer_reviews.author: Ashley Perkins

customer_reviews.title: Perfect 😍
customer_reviews.text: I was terrified of this at first but it does wonders for my skin, for uneven skin it’s really good because it stops pre acne and makes your skin feel nice.
customer_reviews.author: Jillian Marie

customer_reviews.title: Faulty product
customer_reviews.text: I want my money back. Or a new roller. I set it in hot water to clean and this happened?? This is wrong and it’s not usable now.
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie peterson

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use for a first timer
customer_reviews.text: Easy to use for a first timer:) Quality product! Nice case and sturdy roller.
customer_reviews.author: M.C.M.S

customer_reviews.title: First time using one of these!
customer_reviews.text: So far, So good. First time using something like this and so far I like it.
customer_reviews.author: Rita Jane

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: I LOVE THIS!!! It doesn’t hurt a bit and it helps my moisturizer penetrate.
customer_reviews.author: Blain and Christin

customer_reviews.title: Didn't Help Much In My Case
customer_reviews.text: Used it for 2 months, didn't see any significant changes.
customer_reviews.author: David Martinez

customer_reviews.title: I like it very much
customer_reviews.text: I really like this roller, It works to improve my skin. I insist on using it 2-3 times a week. After using it, I will disinfect it and put it in the storage box. I will change it in 1-2 months, it is not expensive.
customer_reviews.author: Gabby Nieto

customer_reviews.title: You gotta try this
customer_reviews.text: Never knew I had a giant later of sead skin on my face! Worked wonders .

customer_reviews.title: Not worth it
customer_reviews.text: I broke out. My skin is worse and has never been the same after this product. I breakout in places where I normally don’t break out on my face.

customer_reviews.title: Cause a terrible reaction
customer_reviews.text: The reviews are not for the correct product. I used this 1 time and had a horrible reaction to the metal. I had hives and redness all over my face for 3+ days. I will only buy a stainless steel one from now on.
customer_reviews.author: jinna

customer_reviews.title: Would buy again.
customer_reviews.text: Bought this from a recommendation of a friend. I’ve had it a little over a month and am still pleased with it. I e seen some improvement in my skin as well.
customer_reviews.author: Holli K. Linton

customer_reviews.title: Love IT!
customer_reviews.text: Great product! I haven’t been using it long enough to see a major difference yet but my skin is definitely changing and I can tell it’s reducing my texture and getting rid of acne scarring! Highly recommend! Super gentle and not painful at all.

customer_reviews.title: This thing is a small miracle
customer_reviews.text: Originally, I was holding a try, because the price was there, but the result was unexpected, the great product was really a small miracle.

customer_reviews.title: My sister love it
customer_reviews.text: My sister belongs to someone who loves her skin very much. She uses the roller 2-3 times a week. Her skin is very smooth. I go shopping with her.many people says she is smaller than me.

customer_reviews.title: A good tool
customer_reviews.text: It is a beauty tool that helps the skin. After two weeks of using it, my skin is developing in a good direction.

customer_reviews.title: Worth every penny!!!
customer_reviews.text: I really Love love the results I am seeing! Had minimized my dark puffy circles and bags. Makes my skin feel soft and helps to erase fine lines. I have had it for about 3 weeks and have used it all over my face and body. Easy to use. Be sure and use the gel with it.
customer_reviews.author: Amy Kolles

customer_reviews.title: Skin difference
customer_reviews.text: Feels like it’s made a difference in the appearance of my skin.

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: Held up for a long time- make sure to disinfect it after each use!

customer_reviews.title: Love it! Recommend!
customer_reviews.text: Really love this product is worth the price and has worked wonders on my skin! Would buy again! It’s my first derma roller and I was a little scared to try it out but it works so good and does not hurt at all and I can’t wait to get another one!

customer_reviews.title: Helpful

customer_reviews.title: It works!
customer_reviews.text: Works great! Results were visible after two or three uses. I use hyaluronic acid serum and pure avocado oil afterwards. I alternate micro-needling with Neutrogena microdermabrasion home kit. The skin looks younger and fresher.

customer_reviews.title: It’s great

customer_reviews.title: Very light

customer_reviews.text: It’s better to apply serum after using the roller, because I have compared

customer_reviews.text: It seems sturdy, but I don’t think the needles are long enough to do anything. It doesn’t seem to do anything.

customer_reviews.title: It Works!
customer_reviews.text: It helped keep my skin clear and the absorption of serums. I had a stubborn area on my face that would constantly break out and with the help of this tool that area has cleared up. I definitely recommend this!

customer_reviews.title: It works!
customer_reviews.text: This was packaged beautifully and comes with a nice case.I've only used it less than a week and can already see a difference in my skin.You won't regret it

customer_reviews.title: Fulfills it's intended purpose
customer_reviews.text: Have not used it a lot as yet, but feel it does help lotions etc. absorb better. If and when I replace it I will graduate to one with longer needles, probabley 0.5 to help with collegen production.,

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: Like this very much. Super effective for allowing my skincare to fully sink into skin

customer_reviews.title: great roller
customer_reviews.text: I like this roller because it is not too abrasive. I use it 3 -4 times a week at night before my night cream to help the product penetrate better

customer_reviews.text: This is one of the products I have used a small amount of good value for money

customer_reviews.title: It works.

customer_reviews.title: Be gentle and patient for results

But I have to admit I've seen some improvements in my complexion. Am anxious to see how far the improvement will go. People do need to know not to get too vigorous or you will defeat the purpose.

customer_reviews.text: when buying thus reviews looked great ...but ow lol I have a high tolerance for pain but this did bother a bit . I did both on my face and stomach (for stretch marks) . won't do it on my face again lol and on my stomach not so bad but could feel it especially getting in the shower ....no bueno. still waiting to see results if it makes a difference
customer_reviews.author: EliB

customer_reviews.title: My skin can’t  live without this serum!
customer_reviews.text: This is my 3rd time purchasing this serum, mk skin cannot live without it. Leaves my skin feeling hydrated, smooth, vibrant and nourished. It’s not thick and goopy, nor is it runny and watery. The consistency of this serum is perfect, it absorbs quickly into the skin without feeling sticky and leaves a fresh, moisturized feeling. Love it!
customer_reviews.author: alicia

customer_reviews.title: Fake reviews and serrated disks
customer_reviews.text: The reviews are all for a different product. Additionally, the dermarollers with 540 needles are actually made from serrated discs that are likely to tear skin and cause damage. Look for 192 needles, which are made with actual individual needles. If you look closely at the plastic of the roller holding the needles, you can see that the seams run laterally around the roller in the 540/disk rollers, and horizontally between each row of needles in the 192/needle rollers.
customer_reviews.author: Caitie

customer_reviews.title: Changed my skin
customer_reviews.text: This product really changed my skin. Just make sure you watch videos on YouTube before using, if it isn’t working for you you’re most likely using it wrong (which I was doing at first). Also make sure you sanitize it with rubbing alcohol before and after using.
customer_reviews.author: keke

customer_reviews.title: I’ve never been this happy with my skin before
customer_reviews.text: Omg... changed my life. So thankful I took the leap of faith and did this. Please do yourself and your skin a favor and start micro needling! I’ve never been this happy with my skin before. Tip: also helps lips- more supple and smooth!
customer_reviews.author: Kyle Ashbaugh

customer_reviews.title: Met Expectations
customer_reviews.text: It doesn't hurt at all. You can store it in its hard plastic case. The picture is not to scale. The roller head is approx 3/4". The handle fits inside your hand comfortably. I'm using it in conjunction with scar reduction products and oils
customer_reviews.author: Martina H. Bauer

customer_reviews.title: Worthless piece of junk
customer_reviews.text: I just feel stupid now for purchasing this piece of junk. Don't waste your money. It doesn't work.

customer_reviews.title: I use a super hydrating sheet mask afterwards or hyaluranic acid (anything super ...
customer_reviews.text: Only used it twice but loving it so far. I use a super hydrating sheet mask afterwards or hyaluranic acid (anything super calming, clean, and hydrating).

customer_reviews.title: In my opinion,  not real needles but a blade
customer_reviews.text: This does not appear to be a real derma roller type with real needles but blades attached to the head. I don’t think I did real damage to my skin by using this but I tossed after one use. Look up Gin Amber on YT to see the difference between rollers that use real needles and those that use blades, like this one.

customer_reviews.text: I like the idea behind it and I have used it for a while (over a year), but haven't noticed any differences.

customer_reviews.title: Works fine if used consistently
customer_reviews.text: This dermabrasion tool is great. I use it 2-3 a week and am seeing improvement.
